sentences.cn: 顽皮大胆的小学生会往上爬.

sentences.en: Andy isn’t a very adventurous cook.
sentences.cn: 安迪不是一个敢于大胆创新的厨师。

sentences.en: But diving from a high platform is more adventurous, more exciting.
sentences.cn: 但是高台跳水更冒险更刺激.

sentences.en: Charles was a real prince of romance, young, handsome, tall and fair, brave and adventurous.
sentences.cn: 查理是一位真正的传奇式的王子, 他年轻, 漂亮, 高个儿,肤色白晰, 勇敢而又喜欢冒险.

sentences.en: For the more adventurous tourists, there are trips into the mountains with a local guide.
sentences.cn: 对更愿猎奇探险的旅游者，有本地向导带领进山游览。

sentences.en: He had always wanted an adventurous life in the tropics.
sentences.cn: 他一直想到热带地区过冒险的生活。

sentences.en: He lived up to his adventurous creed.
sentences.cn: 他实现了他的冒险愿望.

sentences.en: He was predestined to lead an adventurous life.
sentences.cn: 他注定要过冒险的生活.

sentences.en: I began to like New York, the racy, adventurous feel of it at night.
sentences.cn: 我开始喜欢纽约了, 喜欢夜晚那种奔放冒险的情调.

sentences.en: I think I'll try the snails for lunch — I'm feeling adventurous today.
sentences.cn: 我想我午餐要尝一下蜗牛——我今天很想冒险.

sentences.en: I was filled with envy at their adventurous lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 我很羨慕他们敢于冒险的生活方式.

sentences.en: In that time of my adventurous youth, I suffered many hardships.
sentences.cn: 我那经历过惊心动魄的险遇的青春岁月, 遭受过很多的辛酸.

sentences.en: John is an adventurous man, unafraid of risks.
sentences.cn: 约翰是个喜欢冒险的人, 不怕危险.

sentences.en: The menu could have been more adventurous.
sentences.cn: 菜单本可以做得更有新意。

sentences.en: To the intellectually adventurous and the ambitious it was the gateway to a wider world.
sentences.cn: 对于求知欲和抱负大的人来说,它乃是通向广阔天地的途径.
沃伦是个敢于冒险的商人。

words.tran_cn: 冒险主义的；冒险主义者的
冒险；冒险精神；投机活动

trans.tran_cn: 勇于冒险的，新奇的，惊险的
trans.tran_en: not afraid of taking risks or trying new things
